%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% head declarations %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

%This is a template for producing reports for "Dagstuhl Reports".
%See dagrep.pdf for further information.

\documentclass[a4paper,UKenglish]{dagrep}
  %for A4 paper format use option "a4paper", for US-letter use option "letterpaper"
  %for british hyphenation rules use option "UKenglish", for american hyphenation rules use option "USenglish"
  %for section-numbered lemmas etc., use "numberwithinsect"

\usepackage{todonotes}
\usepackage{microtype}%if unwanted, comment out or use option "draft"

\bibliographystyle{plain}%the recommended bibstyle

% Preamble with header information 
\subject{Report from Dagstuhl Seminar 14112}
\title{Perspectives Workshop: Massively open online courses, current state and perspectives}
\titlerunning{14112 -- Perspectives Workshop: Massively open online courses, current state and perspectives}%optional

\author[1]{Pierre Dillenbourg}
  \affil[1]{EPFL, Switzerland   \texttt{pierre.dillenbourg@epfl.ch}}

\author[2]{Claude Kirchner}
  \affil[2]{Inria, France   \texttt{claude.kirchner@inria.fr}}

\author[3]{John Mitchell}
  \affil[3]{Stanford University, USA  \texttt{john.mitchell@stanford.edu}}

\author[4]{Martin Wirsing}
  \affil[4]{Ludwig-Maximiliens-Universit\"{a}t M\"{u}nchen, Germany  \texttt{wirsing@lmu.de}}

%Organizer macros:%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\seminarnumber{14112}
\semdata{\emph{10}.--\emph{13}.~\emph{March}, \emph{2014} -- \url{http://www.dagstuhl.de/14112}}
\subjclass{\emph{K.3 COMPUTERS AND EDUCATION}} % Cite, e.g., as B.3.3 Performance Analysis and Design Aids.} %mandatory
\keywords{\emph{Massively open online courses, MOOC, SPOC, e-learning, education}} % mandatory
% \additionaleditors{Tom Collector} %optional
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

%Dagstuhl editorial office macros:%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\volumeinfo%(easychair interface)
  {Carole Goble, James Howison,  Claude Kirchner, Oscar Nierstrasz, Jurgen Vinju}%editor names
  {5}%number of editors
  {Perspectives Workshop: Engineering Academic Software}%seminar title
  {1}%volume
  {1}%issue
  {1}%starting page number
\DOI{10.5362/DagRep.1.1.1}%(DagRep.<volume no>.<issue no>.<firstpage>)
